Package cmput301w14t13.project.controllers

Class Summary
FavouritesViewController This controller views topics and comments that are favourited by the user.
HomeViewController This controller handles models and UI elements displayed by HomeView.
ImageAttachmentController This class contains code for starting a picture attachment intent, retrieving an image from the phone gallery, and resolving it into a bitmap.
MapViewController This Activity provides the user with a map using OpenStreetMaps for android.
SelectUsernameController In this activity, the user can manage their usernames and select their global username to user when creating or editing.
TopicViewController TopicViewActivity is where the user can view the topic that they selected from HomeViewActivity.
